SOEMCARE

Sonia & Emmanuel G.

We care for 1 pet at a time

This ensures that your pet gets all the attention & love that they deserve which pevents accidents!

Your pet will always be accompanied

Emmanuel works from home & Sonia works walking distance from where your pet is staying!

"I would highly recommend Sonia to anyone who is looking for a pet sitter and wants to have a kind and responsible person to care for their pets while they're away and be able to enjoy their time off without having to worry about their pets, as they would be in safe and very capable hands."

Pamela G.

Apr 13, 2022

"Sonia has taken care of my 9 year old Yorkie multiple times when I have gone on vacation and she has always taken such good care of him. She'll keep me updated as well as send me photos throughout the day. My dog enjoys his time with her and I feel at ease knowing he is being watched over by someone reliable!"

Erik P.

May 5, 2022

"Sonia and Emmanuel were wonderful! They made us comfortable from the beginning. Gave us updates, photos, videos the entire time to ensure we stayed connected with Izzi. She came home happy, clearly well-cared for and we were just thrilled all around. We have more trips coming this summer and hope Sonia and Emmanuel will be available. Highly recommended!!"

"They were great with my dog Indy! I got many updates during her stay and she came back to me very happy. I can tell they took good care of her, and I hope they can take care of her again the next time I need a sitter."

Amy & Alex & Kit B.

June 28, 2022

"Manny and Sonia provided terrific care for Morris at their home in Bellevue for a very long stay. Communicative and eager to know all of Morris's habits, they shared pictures and updates regularly and helped facilitate both an introductory meet-and-greet, as well as a smooth drop-off and pick-up. They were also quick to share updates as their work-from-home schedule evolved. Thank you again, Manny and Sonia, for taking such good care of Morris!"
